liability.dsiConcept: Art Direction that match the concept
liability.dsiCon: I wanted the overall style to evoke travels, the adventures, and the personal connections that the Esperanto project represented. To do so, I knew I wanted a primary font with a humanist feel to itand a hand-drawn logo. This wordmark would look almost like what you draw on a notebook whilelooking trough the window on a long bus ride.
